scope.description: Country-based curated registry of prestigious visual art sources (museums, awards, magazines). Links are official where possible.

museums.name: Istanbul Modern
museums.notes: Contemporary art museum with exhibitions and programs.

museums.name: Pera Museum
museums.notes: Museum and cultural institution with exhibitions and publications.

museums.name: Sakıp Sabancı Museum
museums.notes: Museum with collections, exhibitions and cultural programming.

museums.name: Arter
museums.notes: Contemporary art institution with exhibitions and publications.

awards_and_major_events.name: SAHA Association (support & awards)
awards_and_major_events.notes: Supports artists/curators and international participation; check for awards/initiatives.

magazines_and_press.name: ArtUnlimited Turkey
magazines_and_press.notes: Art magazine (primarily Turkish; include as regional authority).

magazines_and_press.name: Argonotlar
magazines_and_press.notes: Arts writing platform (primarily Turkish; include as regional authority).

museums.name: BOZAR (Palace of Fine Arts)
museums.notes: Major arts center with exhibitions and events.

museums.name: Royal Museums of Fine Arts of Belgium
museums.notes: National fine arts museums with major collections.

museums.name: WIELS Contemporary Art Centre
museums.notes: Leading contemporary art institution in Belgium.

magazines_and_press.name: De Witte Raaf
magazines_and_press.notes: Highly regarded art criticism journal (often multilingual; strong EU reputation).

museums.name: Tate (Tate Modern / Tate Britain)
museums.notes: Major UK museum network; strong exhibitions and research.

museums.name: The British Museum
museums.notes: World-class museum with online collection.

museums.name: Victoria and Albert Museum (V&A)
museums.notes: Major museum for art, design and performance.

museums.name: The National Gallery
museums.notes: Major painting collection with research resources.

awards_and_major_events.name: Turner Prize
awards_and_major_events.notes: One of the most prestigious contemporary art awards.

magazines_and_press.name: Frieze
magazines_and_press.notes: Leading contemporary art magazine and art fair.

magazines_and_press.name: Apollo Magazine
magazines_and_press.notes: Long-running magazine covering art, antiques and exhibitions.

museums.name: Mori Art Museum
museums.notes: Major contemporary art museum with international program.

museums.name: The National Museum of Modern Art, Tokyo (MOMAT)
museums.notes: National modern art museum with collections and exhibitions.

museums.name: 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art, Kanazawa
museums.notes: Renowned contemporary art museum known for innovative exhibitions.

awards_and_major_events.name: Praemium Imperiale (Japan Art Association)
awards_and_major_events.notes: Major international prize often called the 'Nobel of the arts' (multiple disciplines).

awards_and_major_events.name: Japan Media Arts Festival
awards_and_major_events.notes: Prestigious festival/awards for media arts (incl. digital art and related fields).

magazines_and_press.name: Tokyo Art Beat
magazines_and_press.notes: Major English-language art listings and news for Japan.

museums.name: Moderna Museet
museums.notes: Major Swedish museum of modern and contemporary art.

museums.name: Nationalmuseum
museums.notes: National museum for art and design with online resources.

awards_and_major_events.name: Carnegie Art Award
awards_and_major_events.notes: Prestigious Nordic contemporary art award with Swedish roots.

magazines_and_press.name: Paletten
magazines_and_press.notes: Nordic-focused art journal (often Swedish; regional authority).

museums.name: The Metropolitan Museum of Art (The Met)
museums.notes: World-leading museum with extensive online collection and scholarship.

museums.name: Museum of Modern Art (MoMA)
museums.notes: Major modern art museum with exhibitions and publications.

museums.name: Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum
museums.notes: Major museum and foundation with exhibitions and archives.

museums.name: The Art Institute of Chicago
museums.notes: Major museum with strong online collection access.

awards_and_major_events.name: National Medal of Arts
awards_and_major_events.notes: US national honor for contributions to the arts.

awards_and_major_events.name: Guggenheim Fellowship
awards_and_major_events.notes: Prestigious fellowship supporting artists and scholars.

awards_and_major_events.name: MacArthur Fellowship
awards_and_major_events.notes: Highly prestigious fellowship; includes artists among recipients.

related_museums_libraries.name: Ashmolean Museum
related_museums_libraries.notes: World’s first university museum; art and archaeology.

related_museums_libraries.name: Bodleian Libraries
related_museums_libraries.notes: Major research library with art history and visual culture collections.

academic_journals.name: Oxford Art Journal
academic_journals.notes: Highly prestigious peer-reviewed art history journal (OUP).

Oxford University.notes: Oxford University contributes via museums, libraries, and top-tier art history journals.

related_museums_libraries.name: Harvard Art Museums
related_museums_libraries.notes: Fogg, Busch-Reisinger, and Arthur M. Sackler Museums.

related_museums_libraries.name: Harvard Library
related_museums_libraries.notes: Extensive art history and visual culture collections.

academic_journals.name: October
academic_journals.notes: One of the most influential journals of contemporary art and theory (MIT Press; Harvard-affiliated editors).

Harvard University.notes: Harvard is central to global art history through museums, libraries, and theory journals.

related_museums_libraries.name: Cambridge University Library
related_museums_libraries.notes: Research library with art history collections.

academic_journals.name: Cambridge Journal of Art
academic_journals.notes: Cambridge University Press art-related journals portal.

University of Cambridge.notes: Cambridge contributes through museums, libraries, and CUP journals.

related_museums_libraries.name: MIT List Visual Arts Center
related_museums_libraries.notes: Contemporary art exhibitions and public art program.

related_museums_libraries.name: MIT Libraries
related_museums_libraries.notes: Strong collections on art, architecture, and media.

academic_journals.name: Leonardo (MIT Press)
academic_journals.notes: Peer-reviewed journal on art, science, and technology.

academic_journals.name: October (MIT Press)
academic_journals.notes: Highly influential contemporary art theory journal.

Massachusetts Institute of Technology (M.notes: MIT is central to art–technology and media studies.

related_museums_libraries.name: Bibliothèque de la Sorbonne
related_museums_libraries.notes: Historic academic library for humanities and art history.

academic_journals.name: Revue de l’Art
academic_journals.notes: Leading French peer-reviewed art history journal.

Sorbonne University.notes: Sorbonne is foundational for art history and humanities.

related_museums_libraries.name: Cantor Arts Center
related_museums_libraries.notes: Museum with broad collections and research.

Stanford University.notes: Strong visual culture and digital humanities presence.

related_museums_libraries.name: University Museum, The University of Tokyo (UMUT)
related_museums_libraries.notes: Research museum with art and material culture.

University of Tokyo.notes: Major Asian center for art history and cultural studies.
